title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Seventeen
itunes:title: The Cub & The Caterpillar: Episode Seventeen
description:
Revelations, resolutions, and reinforcements abound on this week’s episode of The Cub and The Caterpillar: A Wagadu Tale!


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for access to our post-show discussion, The Wagadu Watch, Bonus Episodes and your Shirefolk Shoutout.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

Theme Music by Jonathan Charles

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
